definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="3"/><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">PEACEFUL</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">EASY</field></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">NORMAL</field></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6.5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><value name="IF3"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">HARD</field></block></value><statement name="DO3"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
